pages.text: $(bold)Sophisticated Backpacks$() adds wearable backpacks to the game, allowing you to carry more storage, even in the early game.$(br)$(br)The backpacks come in multiple tiers, with each tier holding more storage and upgrade slots than the last.$(br)$(br)The mod also comes with equippable upgrades, allowing for things like increased stack sizes, auto-pickup and more.
The netherite backpack is obtained the same way as other netherite gear--in a smithing table, use a diamond backpack, a smithing template, and a netherite ingot.
